title: Exploring the perceptions of nursing internship students and their faculty mentors regarding the complexities and hindrances associated with implementing the nursing process within the clinical setting: An in-depth qualitative investigation
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Amir Shahzeydi, Zahra Hadian Jazi, Sima Babaei
